itemDescription: Scottish lawn and indoor bowler and commentator

wikipedia_page.main: David McGill was a former Scottish international lawn and indoor bowler and commentator.

response: David McGill or MacGill may refer to:
*David McGill (athlete) (born 1901), represented Canada at the 1924 Summer Olympics
*David McGill (bowls), Scottish lawn and indoor bowler and commentator
